{
           ""compilerOptions"": {
             ""allowSyntheticDefaultImports"": true,
             ""declaration"": false,
             ""emitDecoratorMetadata"": true,
             ""experimentalDecorators"": true,
             ""lib"": [
               ""dom"",
               ""es2015""
             ],
             ""module"": ""es2015"",
             ""moduleResolution"": ""node"",
             ""sourceMap"": true,
             ""target"": ""es5""
           },
           ""include"": [
             ""src/**/*.ts""
           ],
          ""exclude"": [
            ""node_modules""
           ],
         ""compileOnSave"": false,
         ""atom"": {
           ""rewriteTsconfig"": false
         }
      }
